attributes.action: Emergency PM Election to replace Liz Truss
attributes.additional_details: Prime Minister 'Liz Truss' is causing the United Kingdom to crash. The United Kingdom will eventually become an unreliable country and increase poverty. Prime Minister 'Liz Truss' since becoming the United Kingdom's Prime Minister has caused great economical failure, increasing the people of the United Kingdom to become more in debt and worried what our future will become.
attributes.background: To call up an Emergancy Election to remove Prime Minister 'Liz Truss' and have the people of the United Kingdom vote for a new prime minister.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
